content:
In this PR, we defined MulDistribMulActionHom corresponding to DistribMulActionHom, so that we could use this and develop the version for multiplicative groups of non-Abelian group cohomology (#31613).
Most of this PR is just adding @[to_additive] tags to generate the corresponding lemmas. Is there anyone who would like to review this? Thanks!

(MulDistribMulAction is just a monoid acting on another monoid multiplicatively, such that the action is distributive, r • (x * y) = r • x * r • y. MulDistribMulActionHom is monoid homomorphism that preserves the action)

#34240
docs#MulDistribMulAction is already there. You mean MulDistribMulActionHom right?
